title: Microphone issues. Google pixel 3 can't hear calls or can hear echo. Random issues.
content:
I purchased my google pixel 3 in Nov 2019 during Thanksgiving. it has been less than an year and i am having issues randomly where I can't hear calls from other person or I can hear echo of my voice. These issues are random and not continues. When I have this issues, I try to disconnect and call back multiple times. The frequency of issue has increased now. Tried changing SIM, turning off Bluetooth, draining batteries and restating but the issue comes back again.

Anyone having this issue?
